nodes.text: Hoolar Freeb was a female Ithorian mercenary who lived at the time of the Galactic Civil War. She was a member of the Azure Cabal, a mercenary group lead by Loruna Scathe.
Scathe placed Hoolar in charge of the Cabal's operations against Frosch Industries, a biomedical company based in Kor Vella on Corellia.

Hoolar Freeb appeared as a non-player character in the video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online-role playing game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011.
